articles.description: Wall Street may be facing an uncomfortable four years after President-elect Joe Biden's team confirmed on Monday it planned to nominate two consumer champions to lead top financial agencies, signaling a tougher stance on the industry than many had anticipated.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Wall Street may be facing an uncomfortable four years after President-elect Joe Bidens team confirmed on Monday it planned to nominate two consumer champions to lead top financ… [+3588 chars]

articles.author: Evan Anstey
articles.title: Gas prices continue rising across NY - WSYR
articles.description: In New York, the average price is up eight cents, while the U.S. average is up by seven.
articles.content:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WIVB) — Gas prices are still moving upward this week, in New York and across the country.
In New York, the average price is up eight cents, while the U.S. average is up by seven.

articles.title: Oscar Mayer Wienermobile accepting applications to drive hot dog car - WLS-TV
articles.description: Oscar Mayer is hiring Wienermobile drivers, with applications to drive the famous hot dog car accepted through the end of the month.

articles.title: Signal and Telegram are also growing in China — for now - TechCrunch
articles.description: As fears over WhatsApp’s privacy policies send millions of users in the West to Signal and Telegram, the two encrypted apps are also seeing a slight user uptick in China, where WeChat has long dominated and the government has a tight grip on online communicat…
